Categorize this IT Ticket:

unable to select contacts snow sent monday march re unable select contacts snow hi please assign ticket thank you administrator sent monday march unable select contacts snow hello please open another ticket reoccurred escalate snow there condition line manager field template excludes does include users corresponding table for thanks kindest regards analyst pl sent thursday february unable select contacts snow hi please be informed we having issue anymore thanks for your assistance kind regards analyst pl sent wednesday february unable select contacts snow hello apologies for late response regarding below could you please advise following issue still present does happen only when using templates such starters one what view using looking forward hearing you best regards analyst community builder ext hub sent tuesday february unable select contacts snow hello we re facing some snow issues tried log starter snow however for line manager section can only select contacts can you please rectify matter urgency thanks for assistance kind regards analyst pl
